discussion.content:
Selected Answer: D
D. Virtually unlimited

"The total volume of data and number of objects you can store in Amazon S3 are unlimited. Individual Amazon S3 objects can range in size from a minimum of 0 bytes to a maximum of 5 TB. The largest object that can be uploaded in a single PUT is 5 GB. For objects larger than 100 MB, customers should consider using the multipart upload capability."
" S3 is a simple storage service that offers industry leading durability, availability, performance, security, and virtually unlimited scalability at very low costs."

https://aws.amazon.com/s3/faqs/?nc=sn&loc=7

Selected Answer: D
D is the answer.

Selected Answer: D
D is correct.

questions.question_text: What is the total volume of data that can be stored in Amazon S3?
Which AWS service gives a company the ability to use a private, dedicated connection between a VPC and an on-premises data center?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: A
A. AWS Direct Connect

"AWS Direct Connect links your internal network to an AWS Direct Connect location over a standard Ethernet fiber-optic cable. One end of the cable is connected to your router, the other to an AWS Direct Connect router. With this connection, you can create virtual interfaces directly to public AWS services (for example, to Amazon S3) or to Amazon VPC, bypassing internet service providers in your network path. "

https://docs.aws.amazon.com/directconnect/latest/UserGuide/Welcome.html

Selected Answer: A
A is the answer.

Selected Answer: A
A is correct.

Selected Answer: B
B. AWS Trusted Advisor

AWS Trusted Advisor is a service that provides best practice recommendations across multiple areas, including performance, security, and cost optimization. It will check the VPC service limits and will notify the user if the current usage is approaching the service limit. This will help the user to determine if they need to request a service limit increase.

AWS Personal Health Dashboard provides personalized information about the performance and availability of the AWS services that you use.

AWS Cost and Usage Report provides detailed information about your costs and usage.

AWS Service Catalog enables organizations to create and manage catalogs of IT services that are approved for use on AWS.

B. AWS Trusted Advisor

"Service limits â€“ Checks the usage for your account and whether your account approaches or exceeds the limit (also known as quotas) for AWS services and resources."

https://docs.aws.amazon.com/awssupport/latest/user/get-started-with-aws-trusted-advisor.html#:~:text=Service%20limits%20%E2%80%93%20Checks%20the%20usage%20for%20your%20account%20and%20whether%20your%20account%20approaches%20or%20exceeds%20the%20limit%20(also%20known%20as%20quotas)%20for%20AWS%20services%20and%20resources.

Selected Answer: B
B is the answer.

questions.question_text: If a company wants to build an interactive chatbot to make a call center more efficient, which AWS service should be used?

A company wants to continuously improve processes and procedures to deliver business value.

Which pillar of the AWS Well-Architected Framework does this goal represent?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
B. Operational excellence

"The Operational Excellence pillar includes the ability to support development and run workloads effectively, gain insight into their operations, and to continuously improve supporting processes and procedures to deliver business value."

https://wa.aws.amazon.com/wellarchitected/2020-07-02T19-33-23/wat.pillar.operationalExcellence.en.html

Selected Answer: B
B is the answer.

Selected Answer: B
B is correct.
